summary: Completed comprehensive testing of currency conversion functionality for stock portfolio tracker. All 7 supported currencies working correctly with live exchange rates.
passed_tests: Backend: All 7 currencies available via /api/currencies endpoint
Backend: Exchange rates API working with live frankfurter.app integration
Backend: Portfolio summary accepts display_currency parameter
Backend: Currency conversion working correctly for mixed currency holdings
Backend: Holdings show original_currency field correctly
Frontend: Currency selector dropdown shows all 7 currencies
Frontend: Currency switching updates portfolio values correctly
Frontend: Currency preference persists in localStorage
Frontend: Currency notice banner displays for non-USD currencies
Frontend: Refresh button works with currency selector
Integration: Live exchange rates from frankfurter.app working
Integration: Fallback exchange rates available when API unavailable
Integration: Holdings from different currencies converted correctly
